content.rendered:
Hey, there!

My name is Joey and on top of being a husband and a father to four, I’m a multi-disciplined professional focusing on web design, UX consulting, and SEO.

My design and frontend work ranges from redesigning mobile apps with hundreds of thousands of monthly users, ecommerce solutions with hundreds of millions in sales, and business intelligence apps for the largest Fortune 500 companies in the world.

I’m building a creative marketing agency with Microsoft Regional Director and MVP, Eric Boyd.

If you’re looking for someone to come along side you and explain how the web can help solve your business problems and ultimately help grow your business, then you’re in the right place!

Here are some folks who were kind enough to recommend me

The quality of Joey’s work is great, and I’ve always found him both easy to work with, and professional in his approach. Not only would I recommend him to others, I already have.

Christian Thurston

I recommend Joey often to other clients because of his reliability, focus, and approach. I trust him with my clients, my work, and I very much look forward to future opportunities together.

Arvin Dang
